sentences.sContent: The bank is controlled by a famous financier.
sentences.sContent_eng: The bank is controlled by a famous financier.
sentences.sCn: 这家银行由一位著名的金融家控制。

sentences.sContent: In person, he has the air of a philosophy professor rather than a gimlet-eyed financier.
sentences.sContent_eng: In person, he has the air of a philosophy professor rather than a gimlet-eyed financier.
sentences.sCn: 索罗斯本人并不像一个目光敏锐的金融家，他更具有哲学教授的气质。

synos.tran: 欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动

remMethod.val: 来自finance(n. 财政， 金融)

words.tran: 筹措资金；财政管理；从事金融活动（finance的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: someone who controls or lends large sums of money
